headline: FIS Recognized as Top Provider for Chargeback Management Capabilities by Juniper Research
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., June 17, 2025--FIS® (NYSE: FIS), a global leader in financial technology, has been recognized as the No. 1 provider in Juniper Research’s new Chargeback Management Competitor Leaderboard. The ranking, which evaluated the top 15 chargeback management platforms, highlighted FIS’ comprehensive capabilities in prevention and dispute management, with nods specifically given to its Dispute Management Services and its software-as-a-service solution FIS CBK, which employs process aut
